scripts.deploy:local: npx mustache config/local.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx mustache config/local.json src/constants/config-template > src/constants/config.ts && yarn deploy:integration
scripts.deploy:docker: npx mustache config/local.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx mustache config/local.json src/constants/config-template > src/constants/config.ts && npx graph deploy venusprotocol/venus-governance --ipfs http://ipfs:5001 --node http://graph-node:8020/ --version-label ci
scripts.deploy:chapel: npx mustache config/chapel.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx mustache config/chapel.json src/constants/config-template > src/constants/config.ts && graph deploy venusprotocol/venus-governance-chapel --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:bsc: npx mustache config/bsc.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx mustache config/bsc.json src/constants/config-template > src/constants/config.ts && graph deploy venusprotocol/venus-governance --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.prepare:local: npx mustache config/local.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx mustache config/local.json src/constants/config-template > src/constants/config.ts
scripts.prepare:chapel: npx mustache config/chapel.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx mustache config/chapel.json src/constants/config-template > src/constants/config.ts
scripts.prepare:bsc: npx mustache config/bsc.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx mustache config/bsc.json src/constants/config-template > src/constants/config.ts
scripts.test:integration: NETWORK=mainnet PACKAGE=venus-governance hardhat test tests/integration/index.ts --network localhost
